'''David Mayhorn''' is a firefighter with station 23.

==History==
David, as a member of station 23, helped with the efforts to rescue [[Max Forrester]]. At the end of the day, he gave his number to [[Andrew DeLuca]] to give to [[Victoria Hughes|Vic]] as he was interested in seeing her. ''("[[Under the Surface]]")''

David and Vic later woke up in bed together. ''("[[Home To Hold Onto]]")''

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
While they worked together on a call, David flirted with [[Victoria Hughes]]. At the end of the day, [[Andrew DeLuca]] stepped in on her behalf and got David's number. ''("[[Under the Surface]]")'' She and David slept together and spent the night together. ''("[[Home To Hold Onto]]")''

==Career==
He is a firefighter at station 23 of the [[Seattle Fire Department]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*His last name came from [[Marcelena Mayhorn|Marcie Mayhorn]], the writers' assistant.
